attr.title: Flywrench
attr.desc: Flywrench is a frenetic action game from the makers of Nidhogg about piloting an aerobatic ship through the depths of space.
attr.inst: Purchase and download the game from steam. Copy all the game files to /ports/flywrench/gamedata
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/337350/Flywrench/

Download the game and from your Steam library,  right click on Flywrench >  Manage > Browse local files. Copy all the files from the folder to /ports/flywrench/gamedata
